mapper.select: SELECT a.JOB_NAME, a.JOB_GROUP, a.JOB_CLASS_NAME, a.JOB_DATA, b.TRIGGER_NAME, b.TRIGGER_GROUP, c.CRON_EXPRESSION, c.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM QRTZ_JOB_DETAILS as a LEFT JOIN QRTZ_TRIGGERS as b ON a.JOB_GROUP = b.JOB_GROUP LEFT JOIN QRTZ_CRON_TRIGGERS c ON b.TRIGGER_NAME = c.TRIGGER_NAME AND b.TRIGGER_GROUP = c.TRIGGER_GROUP
